channel.title: MYSQL problem
channel.description:
Hello, i wanted to make vote4cash system but i got some errors:
SQL query:
<!--?php /** * @author Stuart <RogueX | iVariable--> * @version 1.1 UPDATED: 06.09.2010 * @comment fixed a few bugs */ /** * mysql database hostname */ define("MYSQL_HOST", "localhost");
MySQL said: Documentation #1064 - You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near '<!--?php define("MYSQL_HOST", "localhost")' at line 1
i folowed this tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=476829.0
cmooon!!!

item.title: MYSQL problem
item.dc:creator: @liivapuu13 liivapuu13
item.description:
@liivapuu13 wrote:

Hello, i wanted to make vote4cash system but i got some errors:

SQL query:

* @version 1.1 UPDATED: 06.09.2010 * @comment fixed a few bugs */ /** * mysql database hostname */ define("MYSQL_HOST", "localhost");

MySQL said: Documentation
#1064 - You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ‘<!–?php define(“MYSQL_HOST”, “localhost”)’ at line 1

i folowed this tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=476829.0

cmooon!!!
